question: Which Indian-American personality has won the National Science Foundations (NSF)'s Career Award-2017?
explanation: Anshumali Shrivastava, an Indian-American Computer Scientist, has won the National Science Foundation (NSF)â€™s prestigious 2017 CAREER award for his research on redesigning current machine-learning processes. Currently, he is an Assistant Professor, Department of Computer Science at William Marsh Rice University, commonly referred to as Rice University or Rice, which is a private research university located in Houston, Texas.
